feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:45 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 06:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -10.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Fog. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 30 December 2022
